snp5.5:1061: "Pucchāmi taṁ bhagavā brūhi metaṁ,Vācābhikaṅkhāmi mahesi tuyhaṁ;Tava sutvāna nigghosaṁ,Sikkhe nibbānamattano".
snp5.5:1062: "Tenahātappaṁ karohi,Idheva nipako sato;Ito sutvāna nigghosaṁ,Sikkhe nibbānamattano".
snp5.5:1063: "Passāmahaṁ devamanussaloke,Akiñcanaṁ brāhmaṇamiriyamānaṁ;Taṁ taṁ namassāmi samantacakkhu,Pamuñca maṁ sakka kathaṅkathāhi".
snp5.5:1064: "Nāhaṁ sahissāmi pamocanāya,Kathaṅkathiṁ dhotaka kañci loke;Dhammañca seṭṭhaṁ abhijānamāno,Evaṁ tuvaṁ oghamimaṁ taresi".
snp5.5:1065: "Anusāsa brahme karuṇāyamāno,Vivekadhammaṁ yamahaṁ vijaññaṁ;Yathāhaṁ ākāsova abyāpajjamāno,Idheva santo asito careyyaṁ".
snp5.5:1066: "Kittayissāmi te santiṁ,Diṭṭhe dhamme anītihaṁ;Yaṁ viditvā sato caraṁ,Tare loke visattikaṁ".
snp5.5:1067: "Tañcāhaṁ abhinandāmi,mahesi santimuttamaṁ;Yaṁ viditvā sato caraṁ,tare loke visattikaṁ".
snp5.5:1068: "Yaṁ kiñci sampajānāsi,Uddhaṁ adho tiriyañcāpi majjhe;Etaṁ viditvā saṅgoti loke,Bhavābhavāya mākāsi taṇhan"ti.
